import Navbar from "../../components/Navbar"; import Footer from "../../components/Footer"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; const Customers = () => { const [writingDirection, setWritingDirection] = useState("ltr"); const [customers, setCustomers] = useState([]); const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); const apiUrl = window useEffect(() => { document.title = "Khamco Shop Customers"; const fetchCustomers = async()=>{ await axios.get() } }, []); return ( <>
New Customer

{message}

Customer List

{customers.length > 0 ? ( customers.map((customer, index) => (

Name {customer.name} {customer.surname} {customer.membership_status === "VIP" && ( )}

Last Measurement:{" "} {customer.measurements[0].date_created.toLocaleDateString( "en-us", { month: "long", year: "numeric", day: "numeric" } )}

Mobile:{" "} {customer.phone}

Dependents {customer.dependents.length}

View
)) ) : (

No customer data.

)}
); }; export default Customers;
